channel.title: United States plotting to kill Hugo Chavez?
channel.description:
[url=http://www.bloomberg.com/apps/news?pid=20601086&sid=a6TJORGwN5ao&refer=latin_america]http://www.bloomberg.com/apps/news?pid=20601086&sid=a6TJORGwN5ao&refer=latin_america[/url] The USA/CIA has already killed dozens of South American leaders that have leaned towards socialism, and apparently Hugo Chavez has become a great threat after he has nationalized oil in Venezuela, not to mention calling Bush the devil. Bush recently travelled to South America to try and talk the countries out of socialism and for various other reasons including negotiating with Bolivia and praising Evo Moralis for his Ethanol research. Obviously no country can get away with threatening our capitalist government, but Hugo Chavez is a great man and is for the people of Venezuela instead of himself or another corporate entity. We have killed countless leaders in South America including Che Guavera, and a president of Chile who kicked some American corporations out of his country so he could give the money back to the people.(Che was buried under airport tarmac after his hands were cut off) I think this is horrible and it is very likely that Hugo could be killed in the next few years of Bush/Cheney's presidency. Here's a quote from the article:
March 11 (Bloomberg) -- Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez accused his U.S. counterpart George W. Bush of plotting to assassinate him and promised ``100 years of war'' should harm come to him or his Bolivian ally, President Evo Morales. ``The embassies of the United States continue pushing assassination plans in our Latin American countries,'' he told crowds gathered today at the El Alto Air Force base in Bolivia. ``I accuse the president of the United States of being behind all these plans.''
Debate.

item.title: United States plotting to kill Hugo Chavez?
item.dc:creator: @happy_world happy_world
item.description:
@happy_world wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:28, topic:67106”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=97983.msg1017399#msg1017399 date=1174017618]

Yea that’s why they need to postpone all his ideas. Ti’ll the Elections for the next president are coming. Then finally George Bush won’t be reigning and hopefully they will stop trying to get control of South America.

even any other President is the same as Bush because they control the goverment from behinde the cortons; now one nows who they are, Bush is only a picture which he speaks, he is not the planner for anything (only his speaches and you now the rest) but the things he does are commands from people you and i and everyone doesn’t now, so if the President changes and not those people there is no differnce…

Someone played a lot of MGS2, am I right?
[/quote]

Haha, I’m not sure if he means that but it would be so funny if it was!

Anyways, I wouldn’t be surprised for some reason if it did happen.[/quote]
i don’t play games first of all
second i am stadying politics how they control each other and the goverment controls them.
these kind of information you can not get it from books because it’s not allowed but when you are studying policties you need to lern how things work in the goverment.

Read full topic
